colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES GRUB PA'I MTHA' RNAM PAR BZHAG PA 'KHRUL SPONG GDONG LNGA'I SGRA DBYANGS THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I LAM BZANG GSAL BA'I RIN CHEN SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA MO NAS MANG THOS GSER KHANG CHOS RJE GU nA MA TIS SNYAN TSIG ME TOG GSAR BAS BSKUL ZHING, DUS PHYIS YONGS KYI BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO MKHAS MCHOG LCANG RVA SLOB DPON PA 'PHAGS PA RIN CHEN GYIS KHAMS CHAB MDO NAS JA GA-YU KHA BTAGS KYI RTEN BCAS CHAB SHOG TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I SGO NAS, STAG LO'I DGAG LAN 'BYAMS RGYAS DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I BKA' NGO DANG, KHYAD PAR RANG BLO GOMS PA'I SLAD DU MKHAN CHEN RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI BDAG PO RIN PO CHE LAS SDOM GSUM SOGS CHOS KYI BKA' DRIN THOB CING, 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA KHRI RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS BZHI DANG, PAn CHEN BKA' 'GYUR PA, RDO RJE 'CHANG SMIN GROL CHOS KYI RGYAL PO, SRANG RDO RJE 'CHANG, SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NGAG DBANG BLO GROS SOGS DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN CING RJE BLA MA'I MDO SNGAGS RNAMS LA NGES SHES RNYED CING, ,'PHAGS BOD KYI GRUB MTHA'I GZHUNG DANG, @014B KHYAD PAR SHER SGRON, TSAD CHEN RTZA 'GREL, DUS 'KHOR SOGS GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO RNAMS LA BRTEN GSUNG RAB DANG GRUB MTHA' RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA ^'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES TSIG NYUNG DON GSAL RGYAS 'GRIL DU, DKAR PO ZHES PA SA MO SBRUL GYI LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS RDZOGS PA GSUM PA'I NYIN, GANGS CAN GYI BYA RGOD PHUNG PO GNYIS PA, DPA' BO MKHA' 'GRO'I 'DU GNAS RI BO DGE 'PHEL GYI GAR 'DUG THEG MCHOG ROL MTSO GSANG SNGAGS BDE BA CHEN PO'I PHO BRANG NAS SBYAR BA LA, SLAR YANG PHRI SNON CUNG ZAD BYAS PA 'DIS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
